title: To QAPLA (and others of course)
body:
We have strongly disagreed on several occasions recently, and conversation has become rather heated, with neither of us acting civilised. Which lets face it is not fun for anyone, and not how anyone wants boards atmosphere to be. 


So in the spirit of improving the OCE server's toxicity reputation, I offer my humblest apologies to you. I have been out of line several times and truly regret it, and I would in all respects would like to avoid tension for future discussions, lets keep boards civilised and fun. 

So lets bury the hatchet :P

I am a man of strong opinions, and I have occasionally let fly when frustrated, so this 
apology extents to anyone on boards that has been on the receiving end _(Talon12 and Klavinmour especially.. sorry guys)_

It sounds cheesy, but i enjoy the boards and its community and want to keep it a place all can enjoy. 

:P

{{sticker:slayer-jinx-catface}}

replies.body: Damn, I came in the hopes that QAPLA was gonna get roasted.

Sometimes icy heart just needs warm smile.
{{champion:201}}

A very reverent post on your behalf indeed. However, offence is not given. It's taken. I am sure (almost) everyone here is mature enough to not take anything to heart.

Hats off for the show of ego relinquishment though
QAPLA won't say sorry lol. He will have a good rant prepared but won't post it because the "mods" will come on and silence him.
